sentences.en: And we're bringing the ketchup, mustard, relish all that stuff.
sentences.cn: 我们还要带蕃茄酱, 芥末, 调味酱,诸如此类的东西.

sentences.en: And, oh, does anybody want ketchup?
sentences.cn: 噢, 有人要蕃茄酱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Blue cheese, blueberries and chicken cordon bleu - but blue ketchup?
sentences.cn: 蓝色奶酪 、 蓝莓、法国蓝带鸡胸 -- 蓝色番茄酱?

sentences.en: Combo number three, give me ketchup , I want Coke and to go!
sentences.cn: 请给我三号套餐, 番茄酱, 一杯可乐带走!

sentences.en: Customer: OK, and please give me three packs of ketchup.
sentences.cn: 顾客: 好的, 请给我三包番茄酱.

sentences.en: D : May I have some more ketchup and salt, please?
sentences.cn: 请多给我一些番茄酱和盐好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Do you want some ketchup on your hot dog?
sentences.cn: 你的热狗要加些蕃茄酱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't forget to buy me some ketchup on your way back.
sentences.cn: 在回来的路上别忘了给我买点番茄酱.

sentences.en: I'd like some sausages, and I need some ketchup.
sentences.cn: 我想要一些香肠, 而且我需要一些番茄酱.

sentences.en: Lazio's owners are troubled food company Cirio makers of Italian ketchup.
sentences.cn: 拉齐奥队的老板正是陷于困境的奇里奥食品公司——意大利番茄酱的制造商.

sentences.en: PERCONTE: This ain't spaghetti. This is army noodles ketchup.
sentences.cn: 这不是意大利面, 这是加了番茄酱的陆军面条.

sentences.en: There's a spot of ketchup on the tablecloth.
sentences.cn: 桌布上有一点番茄酱的渍斑.

sentences.en: Use ladle to ladle out a little tomato ketchup on sliced chicken.
sentences.cn: 用勺子舀一些番茄酱在鸡片上.

sentences.en: Would you give me some ketchup and chili sauce?
sentences.cn: 给我一些番茄酱和辣椒酱.

sentences.en: You know , with the mustard and the ketchup and the relish.
sentences.cn: 加上芥末, 番茄酱还有调料包.

trans.tran_en: a thick cold red sauce made from tomatoes that you put on food
